attributes.action: Give Prison officers a decent pay rise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: prison officers work in the most stressful, challenging and demanding environments there are yet consistantly deliver value for money in the public sector but are always treated with contempt when it comes to miserly pay rises, It's time we got a pay rise ABOVE the level of inflation at the very least !!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HMPStaffPay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
